Foto: Nyuguh, Tradisi Turun Temurun Warga Ciamis
01 Nov 2019, 19:28 by Dadang Hermansyah



Tradisi Nyuguh sudah digelar sejak dulu secara turun temurun. Tradisi ini merupakan bentuk rasa syukur kepada sang pencipta atas rezeki yang telah dilimpahkan. (Dadang/detikcom)



Tradisi ini digelar oleh warga Kampung Adat Kuta di Desa Karangpaningal, Kecamatan Tambaksari, Kabupaten Ciamis, Jawa Barat. Nyuguh memiiki hikmah menjaga budaya warisan dan alam di Kampung Kuta. (Dadang/detikcom)



Berbagai pergelaran seni pun ditampilkan di acara ini. Antara lain paduan suara, Ronggeng, Seni Ibing, Gondang Buhun yang merupakan kesenian asli Kampung Kuta, serta Gembyung. (Dadang/detikcom)



Puncak tradisi adalah mengarak dongdang atau tandu yang berisikan makanan khas seperti ketupat dan sejenisnya hasil dari bumi seperti umbi-umbian di sekitar kampung. (Dadang/detikcom)



Tradisi Nyuguh mengadung filosofi dan makna yang dapat diambil selain menjaga dan melestarikan tradisi leluhur. Juga dalam menyambut Maulid Nabi, sebagai sarana silaturahmi antar warga dan tolak bala. (Dadang/detikcom)



Dilestarikannya Tradisi Nyuguh di Kampung Kuta bisa sebagai salah satu potensi wisata yang bisa menarik wisatawan. Ratusan orang terlihat menonton acara ini. (Dadang/detikcom)



Nyuguh memiiki hikmah menjaga budaya warisan dan alam yang ada di Kampung Kuta. Tradisi tersebut telah berlangsung secara turun temurun dari nenek moyang Kampung Adat Kuta. (Dadang/detikcom)



Masyarakat membawa berbagai hasil bumi kemudian berdoa bersama, setelah itu makan bersama saling berbagi, di situlah letak kebersamaan yang terus dijaga sampai sekarang. (Dadang/detikcom)


Ciamis - Menjelang bulan Rabiul Awal, warga Kampung Adat Kuta di Ciamis menggelar Tradisi Nyuguh yang digelar secara turun temurun. Seperti apa prosesinya?

Photo: Nyuguh, Ciamis Citizens' Tradition Down
Nov 01 2019, 19:28 by Dadang Hermansyah



Nyuguh tradition has been held for generations. This tradition is a form of gratitude to the creator for the fortune that has been bestowed. (Dadang / detikcom)



This tradition was held by the residents of Kuta Traditional Village in Karangpaningal Village, Tambaksari District, Ciamis Regency, West Java. Nyuguh has the wisdom of preserving cultural heritage and nature in Kampung Kuta. (Dadang / detikcom)



Various art performances were also displayed at this event. Among other choirs, Ronggeng, Ibing Art, Gondang Buhun which is the original art of Kuta Village, and Gembyung. (Dadang / detikcom)



The culmination of tradition is to parade dongdang or stretchers containing special foods such as diamonds and the like from the earth like tubers around the village. (Dadang / detikcom)



The Nyuguh tradition contains philosophy and meaning that can be taken apart from preserving and preserving the traditions of the ancestors. Also in welcoming the Prophet's Birthday, as a means of friendship between residents and rejecting reinforcements. (Dadang / detikcom)



The preservation of the Nyuguh Tradition in Kuta Village can be one of the tourism potentials that can attract tourists. Hundreds of people were seen watching this event. (Dadang / detikcom)



Nyuguh has the wisdom of preserving the cultural and natural heritage that exists in Kuta Village. This tradition has been passed on from generation to generation from the ancestors of Kuta's Traditional Village. (Dadang / detikcom)



People bring a variety of crops and then pray together, after that eating together to share, therein lies togetherness that continues to be maintained until now. (Dadang / detikcom)


Ciamis - Towards the beginning of the month of Rabiul, residents of Kuta Traditional Village in Ciamis held the Nyuguh Tradition, which was held for generations. What is the process like?
